_exec_summary.SummaryText:
The regulated process is acetylene cylinder filling and management.

                                                                                                                                                Airgas USA, LLC manages the safety of the regulated process by means of operating procedures, equipment testing and inspections, safety devices (e.g. alarms, shutdowns, instrumentation, relief devices) inherent in the design of the facility and other controls and systems designed to prevent accidental release of hazardous chemicals. Safe work practices and training of our personnel supplement the inherent safe design of the plant.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Our emergency response program is based upon the OSHA HAZWOPER regulation. The emergency response plan includes procedures for the notification of the local fire authority and Hazardous materials unit so that the appropriate measures can be taken by the local emergency responders to control accidental release.

                                                                                                                                                      There have been no accidents involving or accidental releases of product that have resulted in deaths, injuries, or property damage on site, or known off-site deaths, injuries, evacuations, sheltering in place, property damage, or environmental damage.



At this time, there are no planned changes to improve the safety of the process. If Airgas identifies technologies or procedures that might improve safety, they will evaluate the feasibility of such a change and implement if appropriate.
